amendment.description: To provide for shared services strategies and models.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2141 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2141 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5094-5097; text: CR S5095) To provide for shared services strategies and models.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2141 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
